snippet: Andy Murray needed three tiebreakers to dispatch Feliciano López in four sets. Despite flashbacks to a crushing defeat last year, the top-seeded Roger Federer advanced more easily.
abstract: Andy Murray, Roger Federer and Serena Williams advance at the United States Open; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray needed three tiebreakers to dispatch Feliciano López in four sets. Despite flashbacks to a crushing defeat last year, the top-seeded Roger Federer advanced more easily.

headline.seo: Murray Hangs on and Federer Cruises in U.S. Open
headline.main: Murray Holds It Together in the Heat, and Federer Cruises to a Win
headline.print_headline: Murray Holds It Together in the Heat, and Federer Cruises to a Win
